message.body: Tsild what kind of wine do you like? Like if you had a top 5 list what would it look like?

Hmm that is a good question...to be honest I don't know much about wine or my wine tastes. I like both red and white, but Dan is partial to red, and he likes malbecs. Does that help? Also, chat sometime soon?
Yeah definitely sorry been busy lately
No worries! Just wanted to catch up :-)
Oh, I ran the movie idea by Dan and he I'd suuuper excited for that movie to come out, so assuming we can go to a showing that isn't too late, definitely count us in!
6 30 and 9 25 at the beacon. 6 20 and 9 55 at the mall
Okay...the 6 ones would probably be better, I guess we'll have to see what the timing is like though with dinner and presents
